Downloaded gibberish looking files?

Please update to the latest versions of either NZBGet, SABnzbd, NZB Vortex or the latest (BETA) version of Newsbin Pro. As of late 2018 Newsleecher, SuperNZB and Grabit (and probably others) don't support the latest obfuscation methods. Please ask the developers of these programs to update their software to support the latest NZB's. If these apps do support the latest obfuscated NZB's then please let us know!

* API and download counters reset 24h after each request
